excerpt: "Researchers in Russia have developed a prototype of a medical imaging system that uses neural networks to analyse near-infrared images of veins and project a venous pattern onto a patientâ€™s body. The system could help make blood draws much easier and less of a nuisance for patients with difficult access to veins."
